message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $10,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $6,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $8,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $8,500 is still a bit too high for me. How about we try $7,500?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but I can't let this go for less than its worth. I'll come down slightly to $8,200. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short. How about we meet at $7,800?
